nodes.text: Sula Autem was a female Human who was the wife of Sagoro and the mother of Reymet and Lissa.

Like her husband, Sula descended from generations of Senate Guards. She lived with her husband and children in an apartment on the planet Coruscant. After her husband went to work as a Guard for the Galactic Senate of the Republic, Sula spent so much time alone with her children. She suffered so much from her husband's absence and aggression towards her son since he was not interested in his father's work.
After the events surrounding Sagoro's case with Simon Greyshade, she separated from Sagoro and eventually moved with her children to Corellia.

Near the end of the Clone Wars, Sula never got over the separation with her husband and was eventually reunited with him several weeks after the Republic was reformed into the Galactic Empire under the rule of Emperor Palpatine.
